name: review2
title: Pho-Chicken Noodle Soup
reviews: If you're not in the mood to trek into the City for Turtle Tower, Chicken Pho You is your alternative.!.-- Amanda
And it's northern style, which is slightly different flavors and ingredients than the southern style..-- Tom
Couldn't decide between the beef pho or chicken pho so got them both with a side of the fresh spring rolls.-- David
